items.sentence: Tom and John have been roommates for a long time.
It'll take me a while to get used to living here.
Do you ever get lonely out here, all by yourself?
There are rumors going around about Tom and Mary.
I believe Tom would never do something like that.
It was just by accident that we met at the store.
Tom and Mary are planning to adopt another child.
Tom glanced around the room to see who was there.
You should have a doctor look at that right away.
Tom was buried in the cemetery behind the church.
Tom and Mary don't want to eat at the same place.
The last time I saw Tom he didn't look very well.
The boy playing the guitar is my younger brother.
I can't understand Tom's obsession with baseball.
Why is everyone being nice to me all of a sudden?
We all face the death penalty if we're convicted.
Once upon a time, there was a beautiful princess.
We're studying modern poetry in class this month.
I didn't eat the sandwiches that Tom made for me.
I wish I would've come up with that idea earlier.
